title: Agate snail
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all gastropods, see [list of gastropods](/List_of_gastropods "List of gastropods").*

| agate snail j [![Agate snail.png](/images/8/8a/Agate_snail.png)](/File:Agate_snail.png) |                                                                                    |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                          | 78-105                                                                             |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                              | 14                                                                                 |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                          | 83                                                                                 |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                 | 4                                                                                  |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                      | 7                                                                                  |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                | 2                                                                                  |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                          | 56                                                                                 |
| Attack1                                                                                 | 18 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour")) |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                 | [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation")                                             |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                       | None                                                                               |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                           | Amphibious                                                                         |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                            | [Insect](/Category:Insect_intelligence "Category:Insect intelligence")             |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                        | [Uses nothing](/Category:Uses_nothing "Category:Uses nothing")                     |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                        | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                  |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                    | [Large](/Category:Large_monsters "Category:Large monsters")                        |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                    | giant slug, agate snail                                                            |
| Flags                                                                                   | [No skeleton](/No_skeleton "No skeleton")                                          |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A huge and disgusting gastropod with a celadon shell, inside which it will hide when frightened.***“Snail, snail, slug-slow, To me thy four horns show; If thou dost not show me thy four, I will throw thee out of the door, For the crow in the gutter, To eat for bread and butter.” -Silesian rhyme, \_Notes and Queries\_, Number 69. 1851 |

## Useful Info

**Agate snails** are slow, lumbering hulks which deal moderate damage and have a tough protective shell, but move and act at less than half average speed. When badly injured, it will [withdraw](/Withdrawn "Withdrawn") into its shell, granting it +10 [AC](/AC "AC") and [regeneration](/Regeneration "Regeneration") but rendering it harmless and stationary. They can be found in [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair").

## Tips & Tricks

- Before they've withdrawn into their shell, any character can easily [kite](/Kite "Kite") them to death. Even flimsy characters with decent weapons should be able to finish them off safely after they withdraw.

## History

Agate snails were removed in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
Agate snail

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all gastropods, see list of gastropods.

agate snail j 
HP 78-105
HD 14
XP 83
Speed 4
AC 7
EV 2
Will 56
Attack1 18 (bite: plain)


Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Insect
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type giant slug, agate snail
Flags No skeleton
A huge and disgusting gastropod with a celadon shell, inside which it will hide when frightened.

“Snail, snail, slug-slow,
To me thy four horns show;
If thou dost not show me thy four,
I will throw thee out of the door,
For the crow in the gutter,
To eat for bread and butter.”
-Silesian rhyme, _Notes and Queries_, Number 69. 1851



Useful Info

Agate snails are slow, lumbering hulks which deal moderate damage and have a tough protective shell, but move and act at less than half average speed. When badly injured, it will withdraw into its shell, granting it +10 AC and regeneration but rendering it harmless and stationary. They can be found in the Lair.

Tips & Tricks

  • Before they've withdrawn into their shell, any character can easily kite them to death. Even flimsy characters with decent weapons should be able to finish them off safely after they withdraw.

History

Agate snails were removed in 0.14.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Agate_snail&oldid=40231"

When badly injured, it will [[withdrawn|withdraw]] into its shell, granting it +10 [[AC]] and [[regeneration]] but rendering it harmless and stationary. They can be found in [[the Lair]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *Before they've withdrawn into their shell, any character can easily [[kite]] them to death. Even flimsy characters with decent weapons should be able to finish them off safely after they withdraw. ==History== Agate snails were removed in [[0.14]]. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
